title: How to check out Pixel 4 w/ Google Fi data plan: getting error msg "prepaid cards not accepted"
content:
"Prepaid cards not accepted" error message when attempting checkout for a Google Pixel 4XL w/ Google Fi plan.  I AM USING A DEBIT Mastercard. Plz Help:(

It is a Green Dot Bank MasterCard with account and routing number. I just want to order a new phone so bad:( please help me and TiA!
